Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Nit-m-ḥ3t Born of Dq-B3st-r-ḥ3t with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard and crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the back-pillar is inscribed with incised Hieroglyphs; there is a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Walter L Lawson
